import{DELETE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,DELETE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS,EDIT_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,EDIT_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS,GET_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_LIST,GET_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_LIST_SUCCESS,POST_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUBMIT,POST_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUBMIT_SUCCESS,UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";export var PostEmployeeTypeSubmit=function PostEmployeeTypeSubmit(data){return{type:POST_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUBMIT,data:data};};export var PostEmployeeTypeSubmitSuccess=function PostEmployeeTypeSubmitSuccess(data){return{type:POST_EMPLOYEETYPE_SUBMIT_SUCCESS,payload:data};};/// get Empoyee list 
export var getEmployeeTypelist=function getEmployeeTypelist(){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_LIST};};export var getEmployeeTypelistSuccess=function getEmployeeTypelistSuccess(pages){return{type:GET_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:pages};};////delete api
export var delete_EmployeeType_ID=function delete_EmployeeType_ID(id){return{type:DELETE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,id:id};};export var deleteEmployeeTypeIDSuccess=function deleteEmployeeTypeIDSuccess(deleteMessage){return{type:DELETE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:deleteMessage};};// edit api
export var editEmployeeTypeId=function editEmployeeTypeId(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editEmployeeTypeSuccess=function editEmployeeTypeSuccess(editData){return{type:EDIT_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:editData};};// update api
export var updateEmployeeTypeID=function updateEmployeeTypeID(updateData,ID){return{type:UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID,updateData:updateData,ID:ID};};export var updateEmployeeTypeIDSuccess=function updateEmployeeTypeIDSuccess(updateMessage){return{type:UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_TYPE_ID_SUCCESS,payload:updateMessage};};
